dialogue: Hello sir, how are you? How is dear Faati?
Thank you very much. Can I take a moment of your time?
Are you going to talk to me too?
Just a few questions.
Iman said you are only going to talk to the kids.
Please, come this way.
please have a seat.
You must know that I am here at your service due to Iman’s request so that we can solve this problem with each other's help.
yes, yes, I know.
I generally do not mix professional issues and friendship, but sometimes friends have to help each other out.
I’m very grateful. Thank you.
I ask you to please patiently and carefully, answer the questions that I am writing.
Honestly, I think it is very unlikely that the kids took the gun.
Usually, the culprit is someone who we can think of the least!

It's not even about a crime. Iman has lost his gun somewhere else. You yourself know these days’ conditions better. You are all busy, and under pressure. Iman is very nervous too. Especially in the last few days, he had written several death penalty sentences, which mentally had a great impact on him.
I understand. But Iman is sure that he brought the gun home and put it in its usual place.
I know, he told me too.
You know the impact of a lost gun on Iman’s career path.
Of course, I know, but it is not okay that he insists the gun is missing in the house and that he suspects the kids took it. This really bothers me.
What about you?
What about me?
It is not possible that you yourself know where the gun is?
what do you mean? You mean I took his gun?
Anyway, in my job, this is a possibility.
Wow, thank you for that… and many thanks to Iman…
No, no, Iman told me that he trusts you one hundred percent. Please don’t be upset. You know better that sometimes there are secrets between children and their mothers.
There is no such thing at all. If I know something, why should I hide it from my husband? In the past twenty-two years, I have always been completely transparent and honest with Iman.
But I know there are some cases that Iman does not know about.
Please sit down.
No, your words are insulting.

Please, I am talking to you with the utmost respect. This room has never seen such respect for the person who sits in that chair. I assure you; whatever is said between us, won’t leave this room. I’m your confidant. I just wanted to say that this case can be similar to the issue you didn’t want to tell Iman for some reason.
You’re saying I don’t understand the disaster that is happening?
It is important to tell me everything you know.
